name: Stone of Destiny
shortDescription: Lia Fail - The Speaking Stone of Kingship
fullDescription:
Lia Fail - The Speaking Stone of Kingship The Stone of Destiny, known in Irish as Lia Fail, is one of the Four Treasures of the
                    Tuatha De Danann and perhaps the most politically significant magical object in Celtic
                    mythology. According to legend, this stone possessed the power to recognize the rightful
                    High King of Ireland by roaring or crying out when the true monarch stood or sat upon it.

properties.name: Origin
properties.value: City of Falias in the Otherworld

properties.name: Primary Power
properties.value: Cries out under the rightful king
